page.title: 07SPORTS IN STOCKLAND
page.content: After our questionnaire survey we discovered that sport was the most popular way to spend leisure time,as forty five people were involved in sporting clubs. Stockland Tennis Club is most popular and holds regular tournaments. We are members of this club, and play once a week. Next to the village hall is the pitch of the Stockland Cricket Club, which is keenly supported.Some other sports clubs include badminton,rifle shooting hunting,swimming and skittles. Our parents play skittles, where they have three wooden balls, and try to knock down wooden skittles at the end of an alley.A {flopper}is where you knock all the skittles down in one ball;a{spare}uses two balls; a{duck} means you miss all the skittles. Darren Copp and Rickie Denslow,11.
